outputs.name: connector
outputs.description:
A Dragonfly Electrical Connector object that can be used within an
Electrical Network.

inputs.name: _geo
inputs.description: A line or polyline representing an Electrical Connector.

inputs.name: _wires
inputs.description:
A list of text for the wires carried along the electrical connector,
which will be looked up in the Wires library (the output from the
"DF OpenDSS Libraries" component). This can also be a list of
custom Wire objects.

inputs.name: _name_
inputs.description:
Text to set the base name for the Electrical Connector, which will also
be incorporated into unique ElectricalConnector identifier. If the
name is not provided, a random one will be assigned.

name: DF Electrical Connector
description:
Create an OpenDSS Electrical Connector from its linear geometry and the wires
carried along it.
-
